scripts.docs-dictionary: jsdoc -c jsdoc.json -t node_modules/tsd-jsdoc/dist -r -d . ; rm index.d.ts ; cat ./types/_start.d.ts >> index.d.ts ; cat types.d.ts >> index.d.ts ; cat ./types/http.d.ts >> index.d.ts ; cat ./types/stream.d.ts >> index.d.ts ; cat ./types/net.d.ts >> index.d.ts ; cat ./types/events.d.ts >> index.d.ts ; cat ./types/fs.d.ts >> index.d.ts ; cat ./types/_end.d.ts >> index.d.ts ; cat types.d.ts >> index.d.ts ; rm types.d.ts ;
scripts.docs-dictionary-build: jsdoc -c jsdoc.json -t node_modules/tsd-jsdoc/dist -r -d . ; rm index.d.ts ; cat ./types/_start.d.ts >> index.d.ts ; cat types.d.ts >> index.d.ts ; cat ./types/http.d.ts >> index.d.ts ; cat ./types/stream.d.ts >> index.d.ts ; cat ./types/net.d.ts >> index.d.ts ; cat ./types/events.d.ts >> index.d.ts ; cat ./types/_end.d.ts >> index.d.ts ; rm types.d.ts ;
scripts.docs-dictionary-dev: npm run docs-dictionary; while true; do find . -not -path './documentation' | entr -pd npm run docs-dictionary; done
scripts.docs-dictionary-build-dev: npm run docs-dictionary-build; while true; do find . -not -path './documentation' | entr -pd npm run docs-dictionary-build; done
scripts.docs-dev: npm run docs; while true; do find . -not -path './documentation' | entr -pd npm run docs; done
scripts.prepare: npm run docs-dictionary-build ; npm run docs ; npm run version
